content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'test2' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.test4
    (
     [CustomerID] int,
     [Product] varchar(100),
     [Feedback] varchar(4000)   
    )

GO

COPY INTO dbo.test4
([CustomerID] ,[Product], [Feedback])
FROM 'https://dlgstor.dfs.core.windows.net/source/test/Customer Feedback.csv'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
     , FIRSTROW = 2
    ,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
